name: mars-roving-ts-browserify
description: Documenting best practices -- typescript and browserify

scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run serve" "npm run watch-sass"
scripts.build: mkdir -p public && npm run build-js && npm run build-sass
scripts.build-js: browserify -p esmify -p [ tsify --noImplicitAny ] -p common-shakeify -t unassertify -t uglifyify --debug src/index.ts | uglifyjs -mc > public/bundle.js

author: nichoth
